links.title: Sparrow Wallet
links.description: Sparrow is a modern desktop Bitcoin wallet application supporting most hardware wallets and built on common standards such as PSBT, with an emphasis on transparency and usability.

links.title: Specter Desktop
links.description: Your Bitcoin node, on your hardware, paired with your signing devices, creating secure wallets for bitcoin self-custody.

links.title: Electrum Wallet
links.description: Electrum is a lightweight Bitcoin wallet. It connects to external servers without the need to download the entire Bitcoin blockchain history.

links.title: BlueWallet for MacOS
links.description: Bitcoin and Lightning wallet for MasOS with a focus on security and UX. Open-source, Segwit and HD wallets, plausible deniability, replace by fee, and full encryption.

links.title: Bitcoin Core
links.description: Bitcoin Core consists of both “full-node” software for fully validating the blockchain as well as a bitcoin wallet and requires a one-time download of about 600GB of data plus a further 5-10GB per month.

links.title: Liana
links.description: Liana is a simple Bitcoin wallet leveraging on-chain timelocks for safety and recovery.

links.title: Nunchuk
links.description: Nunchuk is a bitcoin wallet focused on multi-signature that allows you to securely manage your bitcoin funds.

links.title: Caravan
links.description: Caravan is a Bitcoin multisig wallet you can host locally and use right in the browser.
